title: Me'ila
overview: A seven-part crime thriller based on the unbelievable true story of Eti Alon, an employee at a family-owned bank who embezzled its clients' entire savings and capital, stealing more than 100 million dollars and funneling them to her gambling-addicted brother to save him from debt collectors. When Alon surrendered in 2002, she unraveled a case which transformed Israeli society.
